Info:
Mô tả chi tiết

Hãng sản xuất

Asus

Chủng loại

Pro WS C621-64L SAGE

CPU hỗ trợ

1 x Socket P (LGA 3647)
1st and 2nd Gen Xeon® Scalable Processor Family
Intel® Xeon® W-3200 Processors

Chipset

Intel® C621 Chipset

Bộ nhớ trong

Total Slots : 12 (6-channel per CPU, 12 DIMM per CPU)
Capacity : Maximum up to 1536GB RDIMM
Memory Type :
DDR4 2933/2666 RDIMM
DDR4 2933/2666 LRDIMM
Memory Size :
128GB, 64GB, 32GB, 16GB RDIMM/LRDIMM

VGA onboard

 

Âm thanh

 

Khe mở rộng

Total Slot : 5
Slot Location 1 : PCI-E x16 (Gen3 X16 Link)
Slot Location 2 : PCI-E x16 (Gen3 X16 Link)
Slot Location 3 : PCI-E x16 (Gen3 X4 Link)
Slot Location 4 : PCI-E x16 (Gen3 X16 Link)
Slot Location 5 : PCI-E x16 (Gen3 X16 Link)

Chuẩn lưu trữ

SATA Controller :
Intel® C621
8 x SATA3 6Gb/s ports + 1 x M.2 connector (SATA 6Gb/s & PCIe® Gen3 x4 link)
SATA Controller :
ASMedia® SATA 6Gb/s controller
2 x SATA3 6Gb/s ports

Cổng giao tiếp

2 x USB 3.2 Gen2 ports (1 x Type-A, 1 x Type-C)
4 x USB 3.2 Gen1 ports
2 x Gigabit LAN ports (RJ45)
5 x Audio Jacks (7.1-channel HD Audio)
1 x Optical S/PDIF output

LAN

Kích thước
